flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Sketchup Model

Additional Materials Required:

  • 3/4" Galvanized Nuts (4)
  • 3/4" Steel Nuts (10)
guide.introduction_rendered:
Sketchup Model

Additional Materials Required:

  • 3/4" Galvanized Nuts (4)
  • 3/4" Steel Nuts (10)
Tools
  • Grinder
  • Welder
  • hole puncher
  • torch

lines.text: Mark the holes in the horizontal members as shown in the diagram. Center punch them.
lines.text_raw: Mark the holes in the horizontal members as shown in the diagram. Center punch them.

lines.text: DON'T PUNCH THEM! They will be mag-drilled in a later guide.
lines.text_raw: DON'T PUNCH THEM! They will be mag-drilled in a later guide.

lines.text: Mark and center punch the 4 holes on the face of the U-channel.
lines.text_raw: Mark and center punch the 4 holes on the face of the U-channel.

lines.text: DON'T PUNCH THEM! They will be mag-drilled later
lines.text_raw: DON'T PUNCH THEM! They will be mag-drilled later

lines.text: Torch holes for 3/4" drawer adjustment bolts as shown in the diagram.
lines.text_raw: Torch holes for 3/4" drawer adjustment bolts as shown in the diagram.

lines.text: Weld 3/4" nuts to the outside of the U channel where the holes are torched.
lines.text_raw: Weld 3/4" nuts to the outside of the U channel where the holes are torched.

lines.text: Weld it with a bolt coming thru the other side so it protects the threads and so you know the nut won't get off center.
lines.text_raw: Weld it with a bolt coming thru the other side so it protects the threads and so you know the nut won't get off center.

lines.text: Grind away any spatter between the bolts.
lines.text_raw: Grind away any spatter between the bolts.

lines.text: Make (4) 3/4" x 3.5" bolts using 3.75" threaded rod and steel nuts. See Making Bolts.
lines.text_raw: Make (4) 3/4" x 3.5" bolts using 3.75" threaded rod and steel nuts. See [http://opensourceecology.org/wiki/Making_Bolts|Making Bolts.]

lines.text: Thread the bolts through the nuts and thread another nut on top as shown.
lines.text_raw: Thread the bolts through the nuts and thread another nut on top as shown.

lines.text: Punch the holes as shown. The diameters are 3/4".
lines.text_raw: Punch the holes as shown. The diameters are 3/4".

lines.text: Torch the roller slots as shown.
lines.text_raw: Torch the roller slots as shown.

lines.text: Insure a 1/2" bolt goes thru it.
lines.text_raw: Insure a 1/2" bolt goes thru it.

lines.text: Weld the the thin cylinder support nuts, taking care to protect the threads.
lines.text_raw: Weld the the thin cylinder support nuts, taking care to protect the threads.

guide.summary: Prep the U-channel for the Compressed Earth Brick Press main frame.
guide.title: CEB Main Frame: U-Channel Prep
